awards.text: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 11 nominations.

fullplot: While doing a series of reports on alternative energy sources, an opportunistic reporter Kimberly Wells witnesses an accident at a nuclear power plant. Wells is determined to publicise the incident but soon finds herself entangled in a sinister conspiracy to keep the full impact of the incident a secret.
plot: A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.
title: The China Syndrome
